## Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
gc_data0 <- readRDS("cache/gc_samples0.RDS")
gc_data1 <- readRDS("cache/gc_samples1.RDS")

```

## Add difftime

```{r}
gc_data <- bind_rows(gc_data0, gc_data1) |> 
  mutate(dt = case_when(
    is.na(sample_set) ~ 33,
    sample_set == "A" ~ 60,
    sample_set == "B" ~ 114
  ))
```

```{r}
gc_data |> 
  filter(gas == "CH4") |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(x = dt,
        y = nmol_per_ml,
        color = as.factor(depth),
        shape = well,
        linetype = well
        )
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(vars(amendment))
```
